attachments.fallback:
patch 8.1.1414: alloc() returning "char_u *" causes a lot of type casts

Problem:    Alloc() returning "char_u *" causes a lot of type casts.
Solution:   Have it return "void *". (Mike Williams)  Define ALLOC_ONE() to
            check the simple allocations.
attachments.title: patch 8.1.1414: alloc() returning "char_u " causes a lot of type casts
attachments.text:
patch 8.1.1414: alloc() returning "char_u *" causes a lot of type casts

Problem:    Alloc() returning "char_u *" causes a lot of type casts.
Solution:   Have it return "void *". (Mike Williams)  Define ALLOC_ONE() to
            check the simple allocations.

attachments.fallback:
patch 8.1.1415: build error in MS-Windows GUI

Problem:    Build error in MS-Windows GUI.
Solution:   Fix the LALLOC_MULT() argument.
attachments.title: patch 8.1.1415: build error in MS-Windows GUI
attachments.text:
patch 8.1.1415: build error in MS-Windows GUI

Problem:    Build error in MS-Windows GUI.
Solution:   Fix the LALLOC_MULT() argument.
